hero.headline: Your Own Ordering Website
hero.subheadline: Stop paying high commissions to aggregators. Build your own direct delivery channel with a professional website.

features.title: Zero Commissions, Maximum Profit
features.description: Stop sharing your hard-earned revenue. With your own ordering website, you keep 100% of every order value.

features.title: Flexible Delivery Logistics
features.description: Take control of your delivery operations. Use your own staff or integrate with third-party delivery partners on your terms.

features.title: Own Your Customer Data
features.description: Stop being a ghost kitchen for aggregators. Access full customer details including phone numbers and order history to build lasting relationships.

features.title: Maximize Customer Retention
features.description: Turn one-time orderers into regulars. Use built-in tools to engage customers and bring them back for more.

reviews.author: Sarah Jenkins
reviews.text: Cravings transformed how we handle orders during rush hour. The digital menu is a lifesaver!

reviews.author: David Chen
reviews.text: The best investment we made this year. Customers love scanning the code and ordering directly.

reviews.author: Emily Rodriguez
reviews.text: Insanely easy to update. We change our specials daily and it takes seconds.

reviews.author: Michael Chang
reviews.text: Inventory management is finally under control. We cut wastage by 20% in the first month.

reviews.author: Priya Patel
reviews.text: Marketing tools are powerful. The automated campaigns brought back so many old customers.

faq.question: Can I use my own domain?
faq.answer: Yes, we can map your custom domain (e.g., order.myrestaurant.com) to the platform.

faq.question: How do I manage drivers?
faq.answer: You can use your own fleet or integrate with third-party delivery partners (integration coming soon).

cta.title: Own your customers
cta.description: Launch your direct ordering channel today.
